feed.title: Category: my-web-sites | Evan P. Mills' Ramblings

entry.title: Gentlemen, Start Your Feedback
entry.content:
I've turned on comments after I found comment spam protection in the form of a CAPTCHA code. Comments are still moderated; however, by typing in the letters and numbers hown in an image on the comments page you can provide feedback on my posts.

So if you've got any questions or gripes about the ramblings you read on this site, please, let me know!

entry.title: New Theme
entry.content:
I've updated the site to use Kaushal Sheth's sweet Blue Horizon theme.

Hope you like!

entry.title: Added My Sites
entry.content:
Added a new category to the sidebar entitled My Sites containing links to sites I've developed.

The initial list is:

  • Europe 2006 - A protected collaboration site for our family vacation to Europe during the summer of 2006.
  • KinkyMuffins - A site dedicated to our exchange student Sarah's stay in the U.S. Very spartan.
  • My External IP - When clicked shows you your external (public-facing) IP address (ala http://www.formyip.com)
  • Seneca Guides - A protected collaboration site for my YMCA Indian Guides tribe.
  • St. Vitale's Day - A site regarding the first day of the NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament.
  • St. Vitale's Day Wiki - A protected collaboration site for coordinating SVD information.
  • WildWings - A protected collaboration site for our vacation home.

entry.title: St. Vitale's Day Site Prepared for 2007
entry.content: For members of the St. Vitale's Day Collaboration Project, I've done some pruning and sheering to prep the site for SVD 2007.
